it.polimi.checker.intersection

Class IntersectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.action.CHIAAction<IntersectionBA>
      • it.polimi.checker.intersection.IntersectionBuilder

  • public class IntersectionBuilder
extends CHIAAction<IntersectionBA>
    Computes the intersection between an Incomplete Buchi automaton and a Buchi Automaton
    Author:
    Claudio Menghi

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntersectionBuilder

        public IntersectionBuilder(IBA model,
                   BA claim,
                   AcceptingPolicy acceptingPolicy)
        crates a new IntersectionBuilder which is in charge of computing the intersection automaton
        Parameters:
        acceptingPolicy - is the policy to be used to identify the accepting state of the intersection automaton
        model - is the model to be considered in the intersection procedure
        claim - is the claim to be considered in the intersection procedure
        intersectionStateFactory - is the factory which is used to create the states of the intersection automaton
        intersectionTransitionBuilder - is used to compute the intersection transitions from the transition of the model and of the claim
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the accepting policy is a KripkeAcceptingPolicy and not all the states of the model are accepting

      • removeIntersectionState

        public void removeIntersectionState(State intersectionState)
        removes the intersection state from the intersection automaton and the maps used to store the relationships between the states of the model and the claim and the intersection automaton
        Parameters:
        intersectionState - the intersection state to be removed
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the intersection state is null
        IllegalStateException - if the intersection automaton has still to be computed
        IllegalArgumentException - if the intersection state is not in the set of the states of the intersection automaton

      • updateIntersection

        public void updateIntersection(State modelState,
                      State claimState,
                      int number)
        The intersection computation starts from the initial state of the claim and the model and computes the intersection automaton. For this reason, if a particular state of the model or of the claim is not reachable from the initial state of the model or the claim, no states of the intersection automaton corresponding to this state are generated. The update intersection method allows the computation of the portion of the state space starting from the specified model state, claim state and number
        Parameters:
        modelState - is the state of the model to be considered
        claimState - is the state of the claim to be considered
        number - is the "initial number" from which the computation must start
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the model state or the claim state is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the modelState or the claimState is not a state of the model or the claim or if no state is associated with the model state, claim state and number
        IllegalStateException - if the intersection has still to be computed

      • getIntersectionStates

        public Set<State> getIntersectionStates(State modelState,
                               State claimState)
        returns the set of the states of the intersection automaton associated with the specified state of the claim and of the model
        Parameters:
        claimState - is the state of the claim that is considered
        modelState - is the state of the model that is considered
        Returns:
        the set of the states of the intersection automaton associated with the state of the claim and of the model specified as parameter
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the states is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the state of the claim is not contained into the claim or if the state of the model is not contained into the model
        IllegalStateException - if the intersection has still to be computed

      • getIntersectionState

        public State getIntersectionState(State modelState,
                         State claimState,
                         int number)
        returns the intersection state (if it exists) that is associated with the specified model state, the claim state and the number passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        modelState - is the state of the model to be considered
        claimState - the state of the claim under analysis
        number - the number to be considered
        Returns:
        the intersection state associated with the inputs, null if such a state does not exist
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the model state or the claim state is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the modelState or the claimState is not a state of the model or the claim or if no state is associated with the model state, claim state and number
        IllegalStateException - if the intersection has still to be computed

        Returns:
        the set of transition associated with the black box state
        Throws:

        IllegalStateException - if the intersection has still to be computed
